name: Easy Wheel of Time Quiz 2 | Mixed Wheel of Time | 10 Questions

questions.text: What are the devices called that Seanchan use to control women who can channel?
questions.explanation:
A'dam.

	The channellers are damane and the women who control them are sul'dam.

9.

	Daughter of the Nine Moons.  Mat is told that he is destined to marry her.  She is the daughter of the Seanchan Empress.

Ogier.

	He is ninety years old and very tall. He is considered young by his people.

questions.text: Of what race is Shaidar Haran?
What is the capital of Andor?
questions.explanation:
Caemlyn.

	Baerlon is a small city in the west of Andor.

questions.text: Who is the character who reads auras around people?
Who are the three women Rand is in love with (as of the ninth book)?
questions.explanation:
Min, Aviendha, Elayne.

	It makes for a rather odd love triangle. (Square?)

questions.text: Who is the Amyrlin Seat in the White Tower (as of Book 10)?
questions.explanation:
Elaida.

	Siuan used to be Amyrlin and Elayne is trying to secure the throne of Andor. Egwene is the Amyrlin at the Rebel Tower.

questions.text: True or False - you cannot channel the Source unaided inside a stedding?
questions.explanation:
True.

	You also cannot channel the Source unaided inside the city of Far Madding. A ter'angreal there creates an artificial stedding.  However, with the aid of a Well, a ter-angreal that can store the Power, you can channel inside a stedding or inside Far Madding.

questions.text: What is another name for the Tuath'uan?
questions.correct: Tinkers & Tinker & The Tinkers & Traveling People & The Traveling People & Travelling People & The Travelling People
questions.explanation:
Tinkers & Tinker & The Tinkers & Traveling People & The Traveling People & Travelling People & The Travelling People.

	'Do you know the song?'
